title: Doorashada Martigelinta
subtitle: Dejiso doorashada martigelintaada si aad ugu siiso khibrad ugu fiican martidaada.

responseTime.title: Waqtiga Jawaabta
responseTime.subtitle: Sidee oo dhaqso ah ayaad ugu jawaabtaa fariimaha martida?

within1Hour.title: Saacad gudaheeda
within1Hour.description: Ugu jawaab fariimaha saacad gudaheeda khibradda ugu fiican martida

responseTime.helpText: Waqtiyo jawaab dhaqso ah ayaa keena khibrado fiican martida iyo buukin badan.

instantBooking.title: Buukin Degdeg ah
instantBooking.subtitle: U ogolow martida inay degdeg u buukaan iyaga oo aan sugayn anshaxa
instantBooking.description: Martidu waxay si degdeg ah u buukin karaan hantidaada iyaga oo aan sugayn anshaxa
instantBooking.helpText: Buukin degdegu wuxuu kordhin karaa buukinadaada laakiin wuxuu kaa rabaa inaad cusboonaysii kalendarkaaga.

minimumNotice.title: Ogeysiiska Ugu yar (saacado)
minimumNotice.description: Intee ogeysiin hore ah ayaad u baahan tahay buukinta?
minimumNotice.helpText: Dejiso waqtiga ugu yar ee aad u baahan tahay si aad ugu diyaargarto martida.

maxAdvanceBooking.title: Buukinta Ugu Horreeya ee Ugu Badan (maalmood)
maxAdvanceBooking.description: Ilaa meeye ayay martidu hore u buukin karaan?
maxAdvanceBooking.helpText: Dejiso sidee hore ah oo martidu u samayn karaan kaydinta.

languages.title: Luqadaha
languages.subtitle: Dooro luqadaha aad kula xidhiidhi karto martida
languages.helpText: Martidu waxay kala sooci karaan martigalayaasha ku hadla luqaddooda.

locationSettings.title: Goobta & Lacagta
locationSettings.subtitle: Dejiso waqti aagaaga iyo lacagta aad door biday

currency.title: Lacagta la Door bidayay
currency.description: Lacagta loogu talagalay muujinta qiimaha iyo lacag bixinta
currency.helpText: Doorashada lacagta ayaa loo isticmaali doonaa app-ka oo dhan.

timezone.title: Waqti aagga
timezone.description: Waqti aagaaga maxalliga ah ee qorsheynta
timezone.helpText: Tani waxay caawisaa qorsheynta iyo waqtiga xidhiidhka.

notifications.title: Ogeysiisyada
notifications.subtitle: Dooro sida aad u rabto inaad u hesho ogeysiisyada
notifications.helpText: Dooro sida iyo goorta aad rabto in laguu ogeysiyo dhacdooyinka muhiimka ah.
